Name: Hero Hunters - 杀手 3D 2K19
About the game: Super hero hunter must defeat the enemy to save the world, avoid Jurassic dinosaurs to destroy the city. Super exciting shooting game, waiting for you to challenge! Action games, Arcade games, Crime games, fight games and for those fans of guns weapon games, jetpack games, helicopter games, tank games, cars and truck games. 30 levels Mission, 18 hours game time! Feature： Huge selection of weapons ( Pistols, AK-47, Machine guns, RPG 7 Anti-tank rocket-propelled Grenade launcher, Grenade, Shotgun ) Amazing Explosion Effects Pistol have unlimited ammo Amazing Game musics Realistic weapon sounds High resolution graphics 30 levels Jetpack 5 different controllable vehicles: Helicopters - Apache Helicopter - Attack Helicopter Cars - Van car - Limousine car - Army Truck - Delivery Truck - Gas Truck - Sports Car - School Bus - Bus - Police Car - Taxi Tanks Aircrafts Missle Launcher Turrets Addictive, amazing game experience!
